flavor: They call him "Blackwing" because he's a black dragon...... and he's got wings.
name: Nefarian
howToGet: Unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
text: Battlecry: Add 2 random spells to your hand (from your opponent's class).
